Information & updates

Hi, I'm Wonsuk Jahng

I'm a passionate graphic / interaction designer from Seoul eager to explore, learn and practice design around the world. I'm interested in meeting new people and learning about different cultures. I believe interacting with and experiencing from variety of people helps develop ones way of thinking and widen their perspective

Please feel free to contact me through any of the information provided below. I'd be more than happy to talk with you.
